name: Project Samurai
description:
A young girl decides to become a samurai, her sensei gets kidnapped and secrets start to surface from there on that will change her destiny forever.

This is a very simple old-style RPG.

Based on the original manga "Proyecto Samurai". All other characters are from their respective owners. The game is in English.

Important:

-Always save before going to the tower.

-Make sure you get off the ship on the left or right side of the tower (don't try to enter with the ship into the tower, there's a glitch that will get you stuck)

Game Keys:

Action Button: Enter, Space Bar or Z.

Cancel/Menu: Esc or X.
